Home     About Me     Contact













My name is Adnan Hoq. I am a senior at St. Joseph's College NY and double
majoring in Math & Computer Science. I aspire to be a successful full-stack
developer at a renowned tech company. Moreover, I have an acute interest in the
field of machine learning, data visualization, and software testing. I am
an honors student with almost three years of programming experience. Aside
from my academic and professional pursuits, I like to indulge in the art of
filmmaking. I like to explore my skills and creativity as an amateur
screenwriter and editor every now and then. Additionally, I enjoy going to the
theaters and watching indie films.
